title: BRIEF-Dreamscape Networks Updates On Proposed Acquisition By Web.com
text:
BRIEF-Dreamscape Networks Updates On Proposed Acquisition By Web.com

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 20:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Dreamscape Networks Updates On Proposed Acquisition By Web.com Oct 7 (Reuters) - Dreamscape Networks Ltd : * WEB.COM GROUP RECEIVED CONFIRMATION THAT COMMONWEALTH GOVERNMENT DOES NOT OBJECT TO ARRANGEMENT UNDER WHICH IT WILL ACQUIRE CO * IMPLEMENTATION OF TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR IN LATE OCTOBER 2019

BRIEF-Dreamscape Networks Updates On Proposed Acquisition By Web.com
